objects.text: • INDOOR & OUTDOOR • COMPOSITE LEATHER • SUPERIOR GRIP

product_details.name: Premium Indoor/Outdoor Basketball - Pro Grip & Performance
product_details.description:
• Professional-grade composite leather construction for superior durability
• Enhanced yellow stripe design for better ball tracking and visibility
• Deep channel grooves for optimal ball control and handling
• Moisture-resistant surface ideal for both indoor and outdoor courts
• Official size and weight meeting regulation standards
• High-bounce performance with consistent air retention
• Textured grip surface for secure handling in all weather conditions
• Perfect for training, recreational play, and competitive games
• Anti-slip technology with advanced pebbling pattern
• Stylish brown and yellow color scheme for distinguished look

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a dynamic design for a basketball product. At the center lies a realistic basketball image (`product_image`) enhanced by a highlighted circular background motif, adding motion and emphasis. The layout features a bold title (`heading`) in bright orange at the top, followed by a sharp white subheading (`subheading`) promoting grip and performance. A large orange circle highlights the price (`price`) prominently. The banner concludes with a descriptive tag line (`description`) and a clear call-to-action button (`cta`) set against a solid orange rectangle (`cta_background`). The background is rich brown with decorative geometric and dotted circular elements to enhance appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Brown (#6B3A1A): Background
- Vivid Orange (#FFA500): Highlights, price circle, CTA button
- White (#FFFFFF): Subheading and product details
- Black (#000000): CTA text and price text
product_color: The product image showcases a basketball with a rich burgundy-brown base, accentuated by striking yellow-gold stripes. The base (hex: #7B2D26) creates a strong, earthy background, giving a sense of durability and ruggedness. Bright yellow (hex: #FFD700) stripes deliver an energetic contrast and draw immediate attention, highlighting design segments and adding visual interest. A deep black groove (hex: #000000) neatly divides panels, enhancing structure and depth. The colors are well-blended—yellow smoothly overlays the textured brown surface while maintaining definition, resulting in a bold yet balanced composition. Suggested banner palette: #7B2D26, #FFD700, #000000, with accents of #D2691E and #FFF5CC.
